title: Learning Motivation Design and Analysis for Secondary Teacher Training Master’s Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: The objective is to analyze learners’ motivation types and establish customized instructional design strategies. Data collection and interpretation skills are enhanced through blended online-offline activities

learning_goals: Learners can classify peer learners' motivation types with 80% accuracy using survey tools.
Learners can interpret cluster analysis results to propose educational strategies for four motivation profiles.
Learners can statistically verify motivation differences based on gender and teaching experience and prepare a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
